import React from 'react'; import { useUser } from '../contexts/UserContext'; import './DashboardLayout.css'; const DashboardLayout = ({ children, plan }) => { const { user, currentPlan } = useUser(); return (

SiteOptz Scraping

{user?.name} {plan.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + plan.slice(1)} Plan
Dashboard Scraping Jobs Analytics Settings
{children}
); }; export default DashboardLayout;
